title: Multiple Choice (1 point each)
instructions: Select the best answer for each question.

prompts.question: What are some similarities between the earliest games ever found?
answers: They were only found in Egypt
They did not lead to other games

prompts.question: Which of the following was not a cause of the video game crash of 1983?
Which of the following was not in the console wars of the 2000s?
Which other motivation cluster is most associated with the Mastery cluster of Quantic Foundry's Gamer Motivation Model?
Which of the following is not an indicator of poor game design?
Which game did we not discuss as defying a genre when it came out?
Which video game contained a mod that popularized the Multiplayer Online Battle Arena (MOBA) genre?
Which of the following is a part of functional management?
What is the role of Executive Management?
answers: Defines the vision of the company
Day-to-day specifics of getting the job done
prompts.correct_answer: Defines the vision of the company

prompts.question: What type of artist's responsibilities include creating shaders and doing rigging work for animators?
Which of the following likely would NOT be found in a Game Design Document (GDD)?
Which of the following is a primary reason game developers use source control?
answers: Save code on your local machine

prompts.question: What source control solution is most used in the game industry?
What is used to ensure people do not disclose company proprietary information?
